lead_paragraph: The IndyCar Series champion Dario Franchitti will make his Nascar debut in the Truck Series race at Martinsville Speedway Oct. 20. Franchitti, who also won the Indianapolis 500 this season, is moving to Nascar next season. He made his stock-car debut in the ARCA race at Talladega Superspeedway last weekend and finished 17th.
